name: MyNews
0:
”Alexa, open My News”
”Alexa, open My News for USA”
”Alexa, open My News for Business”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my news
des:
We offer news in English - both audio and visual, for 6 countries and 6 categories ! Try a news for your country or one for a foreign country...

Say, "Open My News" to start ! 

You can directly invoke a country or a category. Eg. 

"Open My News for USA"
"Open My News for India" 
"Open My News for Business"
"Open My News for Entertainment" 

Supported Countries : USA, UK, INDIA, CANADA, AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND 

Supported Categories : BUSINESS, TECHNOLOGY, WORLD NEWS, ENTERTAINMENT, SPORTS, HEALTH 

Disclaimer: The Health News in this skill are publicly available news items provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
